translations.This direct download link is invalid or: This direct download link is invalid or has expired

translations.Link Nextcloud files to OpenProject work: Link Nextcloud files to OpenProject work packages
translations.This application enables seamless integr:
This application enables seamless integration with open source project management and collaboration software OpenProject.

On the Nextcloud end, it allows users to:

* Link files and folders with work packages in OpenProject
* Find all work packages linked to a file or a folder
* Create work packages directly in Nextcloud
* View OpenProject notifications via the dashboard
* Search for work packages using Nextcloud's search bar
* Link work packages in rich text fields via Smart Picker
* Preview links to work packages in text fields
* Link multiple files and folder to a work package at once

On the OpenProject end, users are able to:

* Link work packages with files and folders in Nextcloud
* Upload and download files directly to Nextcloud from within a work package
* Open linked files in Nextcloud to edit them
* Let OpenProject create shared folders per project

For more information on how to set up and use the OpenProject application, please refer to [integration setup guide](https://www.openproject.org/docs/system-admin-guide/integrations/nextcloud/) for administrators and [the user guide](https://www.openproject.org/docs/user-guide/nextcloud-integration/).
translations.Copy the following values back into the: Copy the following values back into the OpenProject {htmlLink} as an Administrator.
translations.Setting up the OpenProject user, group a: Setting up the OpenProject user, group and group folder was not possible. Please check this {htmlLink} on how to resolve this situation.
translations.The URL should have the form \"https://o: The URL should have the form "https://openproject.org"
translations.There is no valid OpenProject instance l: There is no valid OpenProject instance listening at that URL, please check the Nextcloud logs
translations.Server replied with an error message, pl: Server replied with an error message, please check the Nextcloud logs
translations.Failed to save OpenProject admin options: Failed to save OpenProject admin options
translations.Failed to perform revoke request due to: Failed to perform revoke request due to connection error with the OpenProject server
translations.Failed to revoke some users' OpenProject: Failed to revoke some users' OpenProject OAuth access tokens
translations.Successfully revoked users' OpenProject: Successfully revoked users' OpenProject OAuth access tokens
translations.If you proceed you will need to update t: If you proceed you will need to update the settings in your OpenProject with the new Nextcloud OAuth credentials. Also, all users in OpenProject will need to reauthorise access to their Nextcloud account.
translations.Failed to create Nextcloud OAuth client: Failed to create Nextcloud OAuth client
translations.Failed to save default user configuratio: Failed to save default user configuration
translations.Yes, I have copied these values: Yes, I have copied these values
translations.We recommend using this functionality bu: We recommend using this functionality but it is not mandatory. Please activate it in case you want to use the automatic creation and management of project folders.
translations.Let OpenProject create folders per proje: Let OpenProject create folders per project automatically. It will ensure that every team member has always the correct access permissions.
translations.For automatically managing project folde: For automatically managing project folders, this app needs to setup a special group folder, assigned to a group and managed by a user, each called "OpenProject".
translations.The app will never delete files or folde: The app will never delete files or folders, even if you deactivate this later.
translations.Retry setup OpenProject user, group and: Retry setup OpenProject user, group and folder
translations.Warning, everything you type in the sear: Warning, everything you type in the search bar will be sent to your OpenProject instance.

translations.Sign any unsigned \"Terms Of Services\": Sign any unsigned "Terms Of Services" for user "OpenProject".

translations.Allows you to search OpenProject work pa: Allows you to search OpenProject work packages via the universal search bar in Nextcloud.
translations.This application enables seamless integr:
This application enables seamless integration with open source project management and collaboration software OpenProject.

On the Nextcloud end, it allows users to:

* Link files and folders with work packages in OpenProject
* Find all work packages linked to a file or a folder
* View OpenProject notifications via the dashboard
* Search for work packages using Nextcloud's search bar

On the OpenProject end, users are able to:

* View all Nextcloud files and folders linked to a work package
* Download linked files or open them in Nextcloud to edit them

For more information on how to set up and use the OpenProject application, please refer to [integration setup guide](https://www.openproject.org/docs/system-admin-guide/integrations/nextcloud/) for administrators and [the user guide](https://www.openproject.org/docs/user-guide/nextcloud-integration/).
translations.Please introduce a valid OpenProject hos: Please introduce a valid OpenProject host name
translations.If you proceed you will need to update t: If you proceed you will need to update these settings with the new OpenProject OAuth credentials. Also, all users will need to reauthorise access to their OpenProject account.
translations.Are you sure that you want to reset this: Are you sure that you want to reset this app and delete all settings and all connections of all Nextcloud users to OpenProject?
translations.OpenProject URL is invalid, provide an U: OpenProject URL is invalid, provide an URL in the form "https://openproject.org"
translations.No OpenProject detected at the URL: No OpenProject detected at the URL
translations.Please introduce your OpenProject host n: Please introduce your OpenProject host name
translations.Enable notifications for activity in my: Enable notifications for activity in my work packages
translations.A new user will receive these defaults a: A new user will receive these defaults and they will be applied to the integration app till the user changes them.
